channel.title: Creativescape "if" statement
channel.description:
ok so i moved onto creativescape and i decided to make all members items/equipment for premium only but the if the player rights "if" statement is [QUOTE]if(client.playerRights == *){[/QUOTE] then what would it be for premiums/members? i tried [QUOTE]if(client.playerMember == 1){ and if(client.playerPremium == 1){[/QUOTE] but none works could some1 help please?
btw the *'s represent numbers

item.title: Creativescape "if" statement
item.dc:creator: @Scaar1 Scaar
item.description:
@Scaar1 wrote:

Where did you get the random

if(client.playerPremium == 1){

Just set 0 as norm 1 as prem 2 as mod 3 as admin 4 as donator (or owner) and 5 as owner (if donator isnt set)

Then set certian items to only be accessable to players 1+

meaning
if(client.playerRights < 1){

then if you want to be al creative you can do an if/else if/ else statement and make it so if you are player rights 0 then the items read as Premium members item

Read full topic
